abstract: European Parliament adopts resolution commemorating centennial of Armenian genocide and urges Turkey to acknowledge its role in event; move follows comments by Pope Francis calling event first genocide of 20th century; Turkey, which has ignored similar resolutions in past, vows to reject latest one; Francis' remarks fuel long-term debate.
lead_paragraph: A resolution passed by the European Parliament was likely to aggravate tensions with the Turkish government.

headline.main: European Parliament Urges Turkey to Recognize Armenian Genocide
headline.print_headline: European Parliament Urges Turkey to Recognize Armenian Genocide

snippet: A resolution passed by the European Parliament was likely to aggravate tensions with the Turkish government.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
